Phases1.Title: Planning & Strategy
Phases1.Desc: We'll collaborate to map out your website's goals, target audience, and key functionalities. We'll discuss things like site structure, navigation, and content requirements.

Phases2.Title: Development & Progress Update
Phases2.Desc: Once we agree on the plan, I cue my lofi playlist and dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.

Phases3.Title: Development & Launch
Phases3.Desc: This is where the magic happens! Based on the approved design, I'll translate everything into functional code, building your website from the ground up.

FooterSection.HeadingEnd: digital presence to the next level?
FooterSection.Description: Reach out to me today and let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.

Item1.title: How much does it cost to make a website or app?
Item1.content: It really depends on what you need! A simple site will cost less than a custom app with all the bells and whistles. Reach out, and we’ll chat about your budget.

Item2.title: How long does it take to finish a project?
Item2.content: It depends! A straightforward website might take a couple of weeks, but bigger projects like apps can take a few months. We’ll keep you updated every step of the way.

Item3.title: What if I don’t like the design?
Item3.content: Don’t worry! We’ll revise your design until you’re 100% happy with it. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

Item4.title: Do you offer support after the project is done?
Item4.content: Absolutely! We’re here to help even after launch – whether it’s updates, fixes, or just advice on the next big thing.

Item5.title: What will be the method of payment?

content.part1: Bank Transfer: The best way to pay! We’ll share our bank details, and you can transfer the amount. It usually takes 1–2 days, depending on whether it’s a local or international transfer.
content.part2: PayPal: Super handy and instant (unless it’s an eCheck). Many online invoicing systems also integrate with PayPal, making it super convenient.
